list-item.p: ε: proportion of vector Ξ feeding on host Λ in zone i; it is the user’s responsibility to ensure that the sum of the various ε per species per zone does not exceed one
η: (maximum) number of successful bites per time unit of vector Ξ on host Λ

π
uv : probability to transmit infection from species u to species v ( v ≠ u) upon a successful bite

Ω
alt : number of alternative hosts

κ
Ξ
j
: maximum number of vector Ξ individuals in zone j (‘carrying capacity’)
